body:
expand the gpu list for AMDGPU_TARGETS and allow multiple values to pass to Tensile_architecture variant.
I have built successfully the using the below command for rocm-4.3.1 
 spack install -v rocblas@4.3.1 tensile_architecture=gfx906:xnack-,gfx908:xnack-
I also verified the AMDGPU_TARGETS for default cause (tensile_architecture=all ) 
For rocm-4.0.0 , the gpus gfx906 and gfx908 doesnot have :nack- supported and hence did not add it to tensile_architecture but rather  pass them directly
title: allow multiple values for tensile_architecture and expand the gpu list for rocm-4.3.1
